maqras.text: it est temporis those believed open up their hearts deus message truth revealed hic? They non est followers proximus scriptures hearts became hardened temporis consequently multus de them turned wicked
Know ut DEUS revives terra it abiit! Nos sic explain revelations vos vos understand
Surely charitable vir femina loaned DEUS loan goodness. They receive their reward multiplied manifold they deserved generous recompense
Those believed in DEUS His messengers est saints martyrs Reserved them their Dominus est their rewards their light Prout pro those disbelieved rejected noster revelations they incurred Hell

Know hoc worldly vita est non multus than play games ac boasting vos hoarding de moneta infans! It est abundant rain produces plants pleases disbelievers! Tunc plants turn into useless hay blown wind In Hereafter ibi est either severe retribution forgiveness ex DEUS approval Hoc worldly vita est non multus than temporary illusion

Ergo vos genus forgiveness tuus Dominus Paradise whose width encompasses caelum terra. It awaits those believed in DEUS His messengers. Such est deus gratia ut He bestows whomever He testimentum! DEUS est Possessor Infinite GRATIA
Anything happens terra vos iam actum et creation. Hoc est easy DEUS perfecit
Sic vos non grieve anything vos miss nor est proud de anything He bestowed vos. DEUS NON love those est boastful proud
They est stingy enjoin people est stingy Unus turns tunc DEUS est Rich the Praiseworthy

Nos sent noster messengers supported de clear proofs nos sent down them scripture juris ut people uphold justice Nos sent down iron wherein ibi est strength multus benefits people totus hoc in order pro DEUS distinguish those support Eum His messengers on faith. DEUS est Powerful Almighty
Nos sent Noah Abraham nos granted their descendants prophethood scripture. Some de them guided dum multus est wicked

Subsequentis to them nos sent noster messengers. Nos sent Jesus filius Mary nos dedit eum Injeel (Gospel) nos locus hearts de his followers kindness mercy. they invented hermitism nos nunquam decretum them. totus nos asked them perfecit est uphold commandments approved DEUS! they non uphold message prout they habet. Consequently nos dedit those believed them their recompense dum multus de them est wicked
O vos believe vos reverence DEUS believe in His messenger. He tunc grant vos double reward ex His mercy endow vos light guide vos forgive vos! DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
Sic followers proximus scripture know ut they non monopolized deus mercy gratia ac ut totus gratia est deus manus. He bestows it whomever He testimentum. DEUS est Possessor Infinite GRATIA
